name: gtin
description: The main identifier for image assets

name: status
description: The status of the image processing. One of 'QUEUED_FOR_VIDEO_GENERATION', 'VIDEO_GENERATION_COMPLETED', 'VIDEO_GENERATION_FAILED', 'VIDEO_APPROVED', 'VIDEO_REJECTED'

name: reference_image_gcs_uris
description: All the GCS URIs of the reference images used for video generation

name: video_gcs_uri
description: The GCS URI of the generated video asset

name: category
description: The category the image belongs to. Determined by the name of the folder the reference images where originally uploaded to.

name: prompt
description: The prompt used for AI generation of the video

name: notes
description: Notes or comments about the video quality

name: moderator_id
description: The ID of the user who moderated the asset

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of when this row was last updated
